transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji sir. 

Executive: Kaise ho sir?

Customer: Thik hai sir, bataiye.

Executive: A, sir mera, mujhe ye batana mera package kab khatam hone wala hai ye?

Executive: Sorry sir.

Customer: Mera jo ye package maine liya hai. A, kaun si company wali?

Executive: Needles Style.

Customer: Needles Style. Ek minute ruk jaiye.

Executive: A, Siddharth Punia.

Executive: Ye aapka sir khatam hoga 10 February 2026 ko sir.

Customer: 10 February?

Executive: Ji sir, iska to renewal bhi generate ho gaya hai sir.

Customer: Are sir lekin mujhe yahi janna tha ki kab khatam hone wala hai. Lekin sir mera matlab catalog jo live hua tha tabhi se gina jayega na ye package?

Executive: Ha ha, aapka 11 February se live, I think 11 February ya 10 February se live hua hai. Usi din se jis din dekhiye main aapko bata deta hu. Aapne jo pay kiya hai na wo sari cheeze ek minute line par rahiye. Okay sir.

Executive: 31 January ko aapne pay kiya hai sir. Right? Yes. Credit credit card se aur aapka 10 din catalog live hone mein laga hai to wo 10 din lekar fir wahi wo aapka February se aapka start hua hai. Okay.

Customer: Okay, main check kar leta hu because February mein sir matlab mera samjho na ki pura mahina hi nikal gaya tha aisa hai. Isliye main puch raha hu.

Executive: Nahi nahi dekhiye, main aapko proper bata deta hu aur aisa bhi nahi hai. Hamare paas pura details hai sari cheeze kahenge to Siddharth sir ko na invoice share kar do unka seller panel se download karke. Aapka invoice tax invoice hai.

Customer: Aapka naam sir?

Executive: Abhimanyu Singh sir.

Customer: Okay okay aur sir matlab main aapko ek aur keh raha tha iske baad aapki team sir mujhe matlab order aa rahe hai matlab aa nahi rahe aisa hai ki conversation ho gayi hai start.

Executive: Dekhiye sir hamari team proper kaam karti hai. Maine kaha tha ki dekhiye hamari team kaam karegi aap thoda patience rakhiye. Main aapka last ka jo journey hai che saat mahine aath mahine ka jab main catalog handle nahi kar raha tha wo main ab sir past mein to nahi ja sakta. Lekin aapka jo present hai sir wo main sahi kar sakta hu ab wo aapke aur hamare beech ke coordination ke beech hai right? To wo main aapka properly sahi kar sakta hu usme koi issue nahi hai. Aap check karenge hamari team aapko buylead bhi bhejna shuru kar di aapko calls bhi jana shuru ho gaye hai aapne char ka char call properly uthaya hua hai. Aapko inquiry bhi generate hui hai. Dekhiye active rahenge Shyam ji to bahut kuch kar sakte hai. Ab do do raste hai sir.

Customer: Meri baat suniye.

Executive: Ji bataiye. Bataiye.

Customer: Conversation conversation hi nahi ho rahi thi. To kaise matlab ki active rahu wo aap batao. Ab jab conversation start ho gayi hai to main properly matlab jo pehle maine diya tha wahi abhi bhi de raha hu.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Aap properly regular buyleads consume kijiye. Priority basis pe aap daily check kijiye. Aapko ye dekhiye ek digital marketing mein na aapka jo lagta hai na right wo ek set of pattern create karne mein I am so sorry ki aapko wo team ne aapko properly guide nahi kiya. Right. But hamari team jahan tak aapka pura pattern har ek cheez properly aapke catalog pe work on karke sari cheeze hum logo ne exactly jo hai okay kar diya hai. Ab dekhiye do cheeze hai yaha pe ek sir aapka renewal generate ho gaya hai right. Already aap check karenge agar aap in date pe renewal process karte hai aapka cost jata hai sir 32000 plus GST. Aap check kar sakte hai aapke seller panel pe dikhega. Agar aap is month mein process karte hai aapka jo cost jayega sir wo jayega 28000 plus GST jo last time aapne pay kiya tha sir. Aaj se ek saal pehle. Renewal renewal ki baat chhodo pehle to matlab ki teen mahine mein mera ye 40000 nikal jaye na sir. Hmm hmm.

Customer: Jo maine lagaya hai.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: To hi main renewal karaunga.

Executive: Nahi bilkul to aap sir properly active rahiye. Mera past aapko bhi pata hi hai na.

Executive: Bilkul pata hai sir. Right aapne customer care pe call kiya tha IndiaMART ke 9696 right?

Customer: Yes yes yes matlab matlab wo aisa hai ki matlab mera phone format ho gaya tha. To matlab number nikal gaya sir aur IndiaMART pe ja ke maine jo kiya na to direct usko call gaya aisa hai.

Executive: Koi baat nahi to aapka ek ticket open ho gaya hai to aap mujhe ye permission kijiye ki main ek ticket ko close kar pau. Right concern jo hai aapka.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Okay main wo ticket aapka close kar deta hu. First thing. Second things ki aapka jo invoice hai tax invoice wo maine aapko whatsapp pe dalwa diya hai aapke account manager se. Aap properly use go through kar lijiye aapka last date hai IndiaMART mein wo hai aapka 10 February 2026 tak.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Payment date hai credit card se aapne payment kiya hua hai wo payment kiya hua hai aapne jaise maine aapko bataya 31 January right?

Customer: Yes. Yes. Ha 31 January ko aapne payment kiya hua hai 33040 rupees ka credit card se. Service post hui hai aapko 10 January se aur usi din se aapka counting start hai sir.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Any aur koi doubt sir aapko?

Customer: Nahi bas yahi bolna chahta hu ki aisa matlab ki samne se inquiry aaye aisa kuch karo.

Executive: Aap bas proper active rahiye aap sirf buylead consume karte rahiye aap dekhenge ki jo aaj se pehle aapko calls generate nahi hote the inquiry nahi aati thi aap check kijiye. Aapko calls aur inquiry lead manager properly follow karte rahiyega. Aapko jo jitni direct inquiry hogi aapke lead manager mein aayegi. Right. Jitne aapko honge calls wo sare aapko calls milenge abhi tak aapko char call bhi gaya hai aapne charo call uthaya hua hai to no doubt aapko pata hoga ki sir aaj se che mahine pehle kaise function ho raha tha aur ab kaisa kya ho raha hai wo aapko sir aapka experience bata raha hoga.

Customer: Yes. Aur sir plus ek matlab ek call hai.

Executive: Ha ha. A like

Customer: Abhi jo call aayi hai na. Ha ha. Usi mein uska matlab mujhe number nahi show ho raha hai like.

Executive: Number hoga lead manager mein jayenge na aap jab aap lead manager mein jayenge waha uska number aisa hai ki incoming call band hai plus ki whatsapp bhi start nahi hai uska call aata hai samne se.

Executive: Main samjha nahi sir aap kya keh rahe hai.

Customer: Uska do bar buyer ka do bar mujhe call aaya ki mujhe ke liye chahiye aisa aisa hai. Maine kaha mil jayega sab kuch ab main whatsapp pe aapko catalog share kar deta hu. Hmm hmm. Whatsapp bhi uska band hai. Hmm hmm. Plus main samne se abhi laga raha hu call to bhi usme matlab ki ye bol raha hai ki incoming call band hai to like.

Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye to main aapko main agar aisa situation hai to fir to buyer khud hi connect karega maybe buyer ne apne side se kuch aisa rakha ho. Lekin sare cases pe aisa nahi hote hai kuch exceptional cases aisa honge but aap bhi thoda sa aap ekdam careful ho ke apna business kijiye ga kabhi bhi koi bhi deal aap bina advance payment ka mat kijiye ga sir.

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi sir. Matlab like aisa hai ki usko need hai do bar samne se usne call kiye.

Executive: Ha bilkul sir wo client jisko need hoga na aapka catalog ab jab dekhiye aap jab IndiaMART mein active ho gaye jab aap active ho gaye idhar 30 din mein 17 din active hai main aapse expect karta hu ki aap 30 din mein 28 din active rahiye 29 din active rahiye aap jitna per day open karke buylead consume karenge na aap yaad rakhiye aapki company ki visibility aapke company ka jo listing aapke sare cheezon pe utna hi jyada impact padega utna hi jyada wo increase hoga direct calls increase honge wo sare aapke activity pe hai to aap please active rahiye main aapko ye kahunga ki 30 din mein kam se kam 28 din aap open kijiye buylead jo hai high order value ka aap consume kijiye. Hame aapko ek pattern create karana tha jo aapko share karke karwa diya sir ab aapko yaha se initiate karke sari cheeze kijiye aapko revenue bhi milega aap check karenge ki sir aapko renewal ke samay fir aap ye bhi nahi kahenge sir main renewal process nahi karunga aapko bahut sare process maine bata bhi diya hai kabhi kabhi jaiye past lead mein renewal renewal ka aisa hai agar mera maine jo lagaya wo nikal jayega to main main to lagaunga hi na isme wo to mera side mein side mein hi rakh diya tha na maine. Hmm.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul to aap isko properly go through kijiye aur ticket close karne ka sir mujhe permission dijiye ki jo aapka concern open hua hai main yaha se close karta hu okay okay thank you sir.

Executive: Thank you.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know package expiry date.

- Order inquiries are not being received.

- Unable to contact a buyer due to call issues.



Resolution:

- Informed about package expiry date: Feb 10, 2026.

- Clarified catalog live date and payment details.

- Shared invoice via WhatsApp from account manager.

- Advised to stay active and consume buyleads.

- Provided guidance on safe business practices.

- Agreed to close the open ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, expiry, buyleads, renewal, active
